title: The faerie queene Disposed into twelue bookes, fashioning XII. morall vertues.
author: Spenser, Edmund, 1552?-1599.
publisher: Printed [by Richard Field] for VVilliam Ponsonbie,
notes: "The second part of The faerie queene" has separate dated title page, pagination, and register.
This edition omits the sonnets at the end of the 1590 edition.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
